meanings: wing (of a stage, desk, gate, etc.)

idioms.meaning: looking on with folded arms (with one's hands in one's sleeves)

idioms.reading: がいしゅういっしょく

idioms.meaning: you can't give (use) what you don't have

idioms.word: 袖振り合うも他生の縁
idioms.reading: そでふりあうもたしょうのえん
idioms.meaning: even a chance meeting can lead to a deep bond

idioms.word: 袖すり合うも多生の縁
idioms.reading: そですりあうもたしょうのえん
idioms.meaning: a meeting by chance is preordained

idioms.reading: いただくものはなつもこそで
idioms.meaning: taking whatever one can get one's hands on

idioms.word: 袖の振り合わせも他生の縁
idioms.reading: ふでのふりあわせもたしょうのえん
idioms.meaning: even accidentally touching sleeves with a passing stranger is caused by fate
